project.description: The name of the project to display in the Helix Sidekick

host.description: The host name of the production website

container.description: The ID of the dropdown container to add this plugin to

pushDown.description: Have Helix Sidekick push down page content instead of overlaying it

pushDownSelector.description: The query selector for absolute elements to also push down

container.description: The ID of the container to add this plugin to

environments.description: The environments to display this plugin in (default: any)

event.description: The name of a custom event to fire when the button is clicked

exclude_paths.description: Exclude the plugin from these paths (glob patterns supported)

include_paths.description: Include the plugin on these paths (glob patterns supported)

is_container.description: Turns the plugin into a container for other plugins

title_i18n.description: The button text in other supported languages

url.description: The URL to open when the button is clicked
